about_the_game:
Unmasked Truths: Shattered Dreams is proudly created by humans, not AI.

_______

In this character-drama focused murder mystery visual novel blending detective and adventure game mechanics, players follow the story of 10 college students and their teacher partaking in a special certification program run by the world’s top governing authority.

Their goal? Prove that they are the best of the best and are worthy of the exclusive title: World☆Class.

What begins as a relaxing stay at a lavish baroque space resort-turned-college-campus slowly breaks down until it’s revealed that only 5 individuals will be leaving the program with their title…

...and their lives.

_______

Features: 

  • Decisions Matter

    Make choices that impact the story and determine endings, unlock routes, discover bonus scenes, and cause subtle changes in text that change the narrative on each playthrough.

  • Everyone is a Suspect

    Someone has been killed, and everyone is a potential suspect. Investigate the scene for clues and gather evidence before engaging in a high-stakes debate to unveil the truth and unmask the murderer!

  • Choose your ally

    When making decisions as K-Pop Idol Lee Dae Hyun, interactions with compassionate fiancée Izumi Sada and stoic manager Sergei Ivankov affect relationships and how the story unfolds.

  • Minigames

    Discover more about characters by engaging with minigames inspired by each of their professions! Try to maintain your poker face against Sergei Ivankov, platform for treasure with Kristine Brown, get in some drink mixing action with barista Lucienne, and more!

  • Free Roaming Exploration/Downtime Exploration

    Roam the vast college campus to collect hidden items, discover spectacular views, and learn more about characters during free time. 

  • Character dialogue is fully voiced in English, and feature the talents of:

    Cherami Leigh - Sophia Alexandra, World☆Class Teacher

    Heather Gonzalez - Maria Dandois, World☆Class Street Fighter

    Suzie McGrath - Kristine Brown, World☆Class Voyager

    Casey Mongillo - Ashe Buckley, World☆Class Hunter

    Jason Vu - Lee Dae Hyun, World☆Class Idol

    Ryan Bartley - Lucienne Gant, World☆Class Barista

    Kyle McCarley - Sergei Ivankov, World☆Class Manager

    Leigh Joel Scott - Jack Pakenham, World☆Class Daredevil

    Jenny Yokobori - Izumi Sada, World☆Class Psychologist

    Nazeeh Tarsha - Leandre Thaïs, "Some Guy"

    Alejandro Saab - Renard Thaïs, World☆Class Prosecutor

    Xanthe Hyunh - Alice

    Nathan Vitale - Thomas

    Joe Zieja - Papa "Joe" Razzi

content_descriptors.notes:
This murder mystery visual novel explores or implies aspects of psychology and mental health such as sexism, classism, death, abuse, and toxicity in relationships.

The game also includes blood, sexual themes, and violence.

Please play with care.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i3-8350K or AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)/Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 5600XT, 6 GB
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: 11 world-renowned experts are trapped together and must cooperate to survive... until conflicts arise, and they discover the greatest threat to their lives isn't the system they're resisting: it's each other! Discover the truth of who's living a lie in this fully voiced murder mystery visual novel.
